headline: Ventas to Participate in Investor Meetings at Citi 2025 Global Property CEO Conference
summary: CHICAGO, February 28, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that management will make a presentation at the Citi 2025 Global Property CEO Conference (the "Citi Conference") on March 4, 2025 at 1:30 p.m. Eastern Time. The webcast will be accessible on the Company’s website at ir.ventasreit.com/events-and-presentations.
